Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What sustainable or environmental practices have been implemented?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: Amfori members, like Sympatex, have committed to improving their social and environmental performance through various initiatives such as being part of the BESCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) and BEPI (Business Environmental Performance Initiative). They pledge continuous improvement, collaboration, and empowerment. Additionally, Sympatex has been recognized as a "Best for the World" B Corporation, demonstrating its dedication to creating a sustainable and socially fair future. Within their own operations, they strive to minimize waste, avoid pollution, and prioritize materials that are recyclable. Furthermore, they collaborate with suppliers to encourage improvements in working conditions and promote responsible sourcing practices throughout the supply chain.

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: Are there any events or initiatives focused on environmental conservation? If yet then list 10 such events.
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
Yes, there are various events and initiatives focused on environmental conservation. However, providing a comprehensive list of 10 such events might not be feasible due to time constraints and the dynamic nature of these events. Nevertheless, here are some notable examples from different categories:

1. United Nations Climate Change Conferences (COP)
2. World Environment Day (June 5th)
3. Earth Hour (March/April)
4. Global Climate Action Summit (September 2018)
5. CleanUpWorldwide (annual event held on a specific day)
6. World Wildlife Day (March 3rd)
7. International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) World Conservation Congress
8. Our Planet Netflix series (raising awareness about environmental issues)
9. Extinction Rebellion protests and campaigns
10. Greenpeace campaigns and actions

Please note that this list is not exhaustive but rather provides a glimpse into the wide range of events and initiatives related to environmental conservation.

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What environmental impact metrics are reported?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: Based on the provided information, Sympatex reports its impact on the climate through various metrics such as product carbon footprint for membranes and laminates, annual corporate carbon footprint, and efforts to switch to green electricity and replace vehicles with electric ones. Additionally, they report their commitment to reducing harmful greenhouse gases throughout the textile supply chain and achieving net zero emissions by 2030. Furthermore, as a signatory and active participant in the Fashion Industry Charter for Climate Action, Sympatex is dedicated to minimizing the industry's impact on the environment. Lastly, it should be noted that Sympatex is a member of several organizations focused on promoting sustainability within the outdoor sector, including the European Outdoor Group (EOG), the Sustainable Apparel Coalition (SAC), and the Higg

source.content: report annually on our impact on the climate According to our CDP ranking from the largest international reporting platform for greenhouse gas emissions data Sympatex achieves a B- This score means that we are above average globally for the textile industry The aim of the CDP is to make environmental data transparent and accessible to all and to promote societal and economic change towards more environmentally friendly alternatives In addition to calculating the product carbon footprint for our membranes and laminates we also calculate our annual corporate carbon footprint As a result of this we switched our entire company over to using green electricity in  and we are gradually replacing our fleet of vehicles with electric vehicles It doesn’t stop with us Avoiding CO2 emissions and reducing them as much as possible is the main priority for Sympatex That’s why we give our customers the opportunity to reduce their environmental impact to an unavoidable minimum The remaining CO2

laminates we also calculate our annual corporate carbon footprint As a result of this we switched our entire company over to using green electricity in  and we are gradually replacing our fleet of vehicles with electric vehicles As a signatory and an active participant in the development of the Fashion Industry Charter for Climate Action we are committed to continuously reducing harmful greenhouse gases across the entire textile supply chain and achieving net zero emissions by  The charter was launched at COP24 the world climate conference held in Poland in  It consists of a list of minimal targets which representatives from the clothing industry have agreed on under the direction of the UN in order to curb this industry’s impact on the environment The current charter is available here We report annually on our impact on the climate According to our CDP ranking from the largest international reporting platform for greenhouse gas emissions data Sympatex achieves a B- This score means

that represents the outdoor sector It was originally founded by 19 of the world’s largest outdoor companies who recognised the need for a stringent cross-border approach to representing the outdoor sector Sympatex joined the EOG in  Sympatex has been a member of the Sustainable Apparel Coalition SAC since  The initiative is made up of over  brands and retailers as well as manufacturing companies from the footwear and clothing industry that work together with trade associations non-profit organisations and academic institutions to reduce the environmental impact of their products worldwide The aim of the SAC is to develop a universal approach to measuring the sustainability performance of a company Higg-Index With the  Higg Index SAC has developed a tool that measures and evaluates the sustainability performance of companies products and processes across the entire supply chain and identifies priority areas of action and opportunities It comprises a total of five modules Sympatex works

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: Has the organization made any public commitments to social or corporate responsibility?
Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result: Yes, Sympatex has committed to various social and environmental initiatives. They have been a member of the BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) since  and follow its code of conduct as a guideline for their business practices. Additionally, they support and guide many of their suppliers in their efforts to continually improve working conditions for all employees. As a "Best for the World" B Corporation, Sympatex is part of a global movement that advocates for a sustainable and socially fair future, going beyond profit-driven approaches.

A two-sided position paper and the corresponding report are available to view here SympatexはSustainable Apparel Coaliton SAC Higg Indexを使用しています。この指標は企業のサステナビリティ・パフォーマンスを測定・評価し、優先的に取り組むべき分野や機会を特定するための手段です。サプライヤーはHigg Facility Social and Labor Module（FSLM）を使用して労働時間、賃金と福利厚生、健康と安全、コミュニティへの参加といった分野における生産の社会的影響を測定しています。私たちはパフォーマンスを向上させるための施策の策定と実施をサポートします。 amforiは40カ国以上から以上の小売業者、輸入業者、ブランド、協会が参加するグローバルなビジネス団体です。その目的は倫理的で透明性のある持続可能な行動を経済界に定着させることです。BEPI Business Environmental Performance Initiative と BSCI Business Social Compliance Initiative の2つのイニシアチブの助けを借りて、amforiのメンバーはパートナー（サプライヤーなど）のパフォーマンスも含めて、社会と環境のパフォーマンスをチェックし評価することができます。Sympatexは年からBSCIに加盟し行動規範を企業活動のガイドラインとして活用しています。また、全従業員の労働条件を継続的に改善するために多数のサプライヤーに同行して支援しています。 Click on the button to load the content from  SUPPLIER MAPBy clicking the button you agree to the privacy policy of Google More info  here Click on the button to load the content from  SUPPLIER MAPBy clicking the button you agree to the privacy policy of Google More info

globale che riunisce oltre  rivenditori importatori marchi e associazioni di oltre 40 paesi L’obiettivo è ancorare un commercio etico trasparente e sostenibile nell’economia Con l’aiuto delle due iniziative BEPI Business Environmental Performance Initiative e BSCI Business Social Compliance Initiative i membri amfori possono verificare e valutare le proprie prestazioni sociali e ambientali comprese quelle dei loro partner es dei fornitori I partecipanti alle iniziative si impegnano a migliorare collaborare e responsabilizzare continui Dal  Sympatex è membro BCSI e usiamo il Code of Conduct come linea guida per le nostre attività imprenditoriali Inoltre accompagniamo e supportiamo numerosi dei nostri fornitori lungo il percorso di miglioramento continuo delle condizioni di lavoro per tutti i dipendenti Facciamo parte delle aziende B Corp “Best for the World” Il “B Corp Movement” è un movimento globale di aziende che promuove attivamente un futuro sostenibile sociale ed equo Come

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: Are there annual or quarterly reports detailing these commitments? If yes, then summarize.
Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result: Based on the provided information, it seems that there may not be specific annual or quarterly reports dedicated solely to detailing the commitments mentioned. However, some relevant details regarding sustainable practices, transparency, and collaboration with suppliers can be found throughout the text. For instance, the company visits its suppliers regularly to build trust and improve communication. Additionally, the company monitors the sustainability performance of its suppliers using various tools and verifies their progress periodically. Overall, while there might not be dedicated reports, the company does seem committed to implementing sustainable practices and fostering strong relationships with its suppliers.

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: What community or social events have been organized to fulfill these commitments?
Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result: It appears from the given context that there have been several community and social events organized under the "Sympathy Lab" umbrella to fulfill the commitments made by various stakeholders involved in the project. These events aim to promote transparency, circularity, and sustainability within the textile and outdoor industries. The events include webinars, roundtable discussions, and workshops held during trade fairs like ISPO. Through these gatherings, participants share insights, ideas, and best practices related to sustainability, circularity, and other relevant topics. By fostering open communication and collaboration among various actors in the industry, these events contribute to the overall goal of creating a more environmentally and socially responsible textile and outdoor sector.

source.content: practice Questa trasparenza incondizionata rappresenta un presupposto per la trasformazione del settore tessile in un’industria circolare socialmente e ecologicamente compatibile Ci affidiamo alla cooperazione all’interno dell’industria tessile e del settore dell’outdoor e da dicembre  con la serie di webinar “Sympathy Lab” stiamo promuovendo un dialogo aperto e visionario in collaborazione con vari partner noti e change leader per discutere regolarmente del settore In questo contesto iniziamo e impariamo insieme come la circolarità può funzionare per l’intera industria tessile e dell’outdoor L’obiettivo è quello di creare una libreria Per questo Sympathy Lab invita tutti gli attori a condividere qui le informazioni rilevanti solo insieme possiamo dare vita a un movimento molto più ampio Sympathy Lab L’associazione per l’industria tessile è un’iniziativa multi-stakeholder finanziata dalla Repubblica Federale Tedesca con l’obiettivo di ottenere miglioramenti sostenibili sociali

topics can be found on the Sympathy Lab website “What is more important to us than the future for our children Nothing – that’s right” says Kim Scholze Chief Sustainable Community Manager and Head of Storytelling at Sympatex “And in order for us to be able to push this in all facets of our working and living environments we need to know what they need Ecologically and monetarily it seems obvious even if it is fragile to the maximum As far as working worlds and design are concerned we who shape and decide future paths can still learn a lot – we just have to listen” Scholze adds Since December  the “Sympathy Lab” webinar series has stimulated a visionary open dialogue around relevant and sustainable topics In cooperation with different well-known partners and change leaders the industry talk will also be held regularly in  Here we will jointly initiate and learn how circularity can work for the entire outdoor and textile industry All information on the webinar as well as all previously

Commerce & Products.question: What products, services, or technologies are available?
Commerce & Products.result: Based on the provided information, it appears that there are several key offerings from the company mentioned in the text. These include applications and PLM solutions for various customers, which help to reduce sampling and prototyping costs while accelerating the product development process. Additionally, these solutions aim to minimize the environmental footprint, indicating a focus on sustainability and eco-friendliness. Furthermore, the company provides internal IT support in part-time hours (20 hours per week), highlighting their commitment to efficient operations and customer satisfaction. Lastly, they encourage subscribing to their newsletter for updates on exciting news, inspiring stories, and other important information.

Commerce & Products.question: What are the key partnerships or collaborations related to commerce?
Commerce & Products.result:
There isn't a direct mention of "key partnerships or collaborations related to commerce" within the provided text. However, the text does discuss several types of partnerships and collaborations that could potentially be relevant to commerce. Some examples include:

1. Supplier collaboration: Working closely with suppliers to improve sustainability, address unit quantity issues, and share resources (e.g., local production).
2. Government support: Seeking government subsidies and tax relief programs to help small companies overcome challenges like limited margins and high costs associated with sustainability efforts.
3. Customer engagement: Recognizing that consumers play the biggest role in promoting sustainable practices, and understanding how their choices can impact the overall market.

Employment & Opportunities.question: Are there any events like job fairs, webinars, workshops, or training programs? If yes, list them.
Employment & Opportunities.result:
Yes, there are various events such as job fairs, webinars, workshops, and training programs related to B Corporations. Here's a list of some notable events:

1. B Corporation Global Summit - This annual event brings together leaders from the global B Corp community to share insights, collaborate, and celebrate successes. The summit features keynote speakers, breakout sessions, networking opportunities, and more.
2. Webinars by B Lab - B Lab, the organization behind the B Corp certification, offers periodic webinars covering topics relevant to B Corps, including best practices, updates on certification requirements, and more. These webinars are typically free and open to anyone interested in learning about B Corps.
3. Local Workshops and Events - Many cities host local workshops, conferences, and other events focused on B Corporations. These events often provide valuable information and networking opportunities for businesses and individuals interested in becoming B Corps or supporting existing ones. Check your local chamber of commerce, economic development organizations, or social enterprise groups for upcoming events in your area.
4. Training Programs - There are several training programs available that focus specifically on helping businesses become B Corporations or improve their social and environmental performance. Some examples include the B Impact Assessment Training, which teaches participants how to evaluate and manage their impact using the B Impact Assessment; and the B Corp Essentials Course, which provides an overview of the B Corp movement and its principles.
5. Job Fairs - While there may not be dedicated job fairs solely for B Corporations, many traditional job fairs feature employers who are B Corps or are committed to sustainability and social responsibility. Attending these events can help connect job seekers with potential employers who align with their values.

be fully connected to the DMIx Cloud free of charge and receive training from us Personally I would like to see people in the fashion industry understand the advantages of a digital or virtual way of working and use it for themselves as is already the case in the automotive industry for example I think our industry should look to the right and left to learn how well and sensibly others are already using digitalization for example in prototyping For me a digital and a sustainable resource-saving way of working are very closely related and I wish that more companies would recognize this and jump on the digitalization bandwagon We are already saving important resources using fewer chemicals and less water Likewise significantly less mail is sent around the world With a 3D material library physical samples become largely obsolete Likewise resources for creating sample material are again saved Also the possibility for our customers to see their desired colors and prints virtually in

Employment & Opportunities.question: What employee or participant benefits are highlighted?
Employment & Opportunities.result: The passage mentions several employee/participant benefits that are highlighted. These include opportunities for collaboration and exchange within the inner security sector, access to a strong framework program, participation in panel discussions focused on sustainable procurement, and being part of a global network committed to creating an inclusive, equitable, and regenerative economy. Additionally, employees may feel proud to work for a company that has achieved "Best for the World" status, demonstrating their commitment to social and environmental responsibility.

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What organizations, institutions, or entities is the organization collaborating with?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
Based on the provided information, Sympatex is involved in various initiatives and networks related to sustainability and corporate responsibility. Some of these include:

1. amfori BEPI (Business Environmental Performance Initiative) and BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative): These are two initiatives where Sympatex participates to monitor and assess its social and environmental performance, as well as that of its partners, such as suppliers.
2. B Corp Movement: As a "Best for the World" B Corp, Sympatex is part of this global movement that seeks to create a more sustainable, equitable, and regenerative economy through responsible business practices.
3. B Labs: By receiving the "Best for the World" award from B Labs, Sympatex demonstrates its involvement in the broader B Corp community, which works together to drive positive change in the global economic system.

source.content: and sustainable practices in business With the help of two initiatives the BEPI Business Environmental Performance Initiative and the BSCI Business Social Compliance Initiative amfori members can monitor and assess their social and environmental performance including that of their partners eg suppliers Participants of this initiative commit to continual improvement collaboration and empowerment Sympatex has been a BSCI member since  and we use the code of conduct as a guide for our business practices In addition we guide and support many of our suppliers in their efforts to continually improve working conditions for all employees We are one of the “Best for the World” B Corps The B Corp Movement is a global movement led by companies that actively work towards an environmentally sustainable and socially fair future It is an internationally recognised label and represents an approach to business that is not based solely on maximising profits but also on a deep commitment to transparency

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: Are there any joint events, projects, or initiatives? If yes then list them.
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
Yes, there are several joint events, projects, and initiatives involving Sympatex, the European Outdoor Group (EOG), and other organizations. Some notable examples include:

1. Sympathy Lab: This is a series of webinars organized by Sympatex and various partners from the outdoor industry. These webinars promote open and visionary discussions about circular economy principles applicable to the entire textile and outdoor sectors. By sharing information and insights, participants hope to create a comprehensive library of resources that will enable the growth of a much larger movement toward sustainability.

1. European Outdoor Conference (EOCA): The EOCA is an annual conference organized by the European Outdoor Group. Sympatex has participated in previous editions of the conference, showcasing its commitment to sustainability and contributing to the overall discussion around responsible practices in the outdoor industry.

1. Collaboration through BSCI and BEPI: As a member of the BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative) and BEPI (Business Environmental Performance Initiative), Sympatex works closely with other companies and stakeholders to monitor and assess their social and environmental performance. Through these initiatives, Sympatex engages in continuous improvement, collaboration, and empowerment, ultimately fostering a more sustainable and responsible industry.

source.content: here – only together can a much larger movement occur Sympathy Lab The Partnership for Sustainable Textiles is a multi-stakeholder initiative led by the German government with the aim of achieving sustainable social environmental and economic improvements across the entire textile value chain The partnership focuses on community projects shared learning and individual responsibility Every two years every member identifies the opportunities and risks within their own business processes with the help of a roadmap and sets out measures to progress towards the partnership’s aim of a sustainable textile value chain Sympatex has been an active member since  Find out more on our partnership member profile The European Outdoor Group founded in  has developed into a high-profile dynamic organisation that represents the outdoor sector It was originally founded by 19 of the world’s largest outdoor companies who recognised the need for a stringent cross-border approach to representing the outdoor

practice Questa trasparenza incondizionata rappresenta un presupposto per la trasformazione del settore tessile in un’industria circolare socialmente e ecologicamente compatibile Ci affidiamo alla cooperazione all’interno dell’industria tessile e del settore dell’outdoor e da dicembre  con la serie di webinar “Sympathy Lab” stiamo promuovendo un dialogo aperto e visionario in collaborazione con vari partner noti e change leader per discutere regolarmente del settore In questo contesto iniziamo e impariamo insieme come la circolarità può funzionare per l’intera industria tessile e dell’outdoor L’obiettivo è quello di creare una libreria Per questo Sympathy Lab invita tutti gli attori a condividere qui le informazioni rilevanti solo insieme possiamo dare vita a un movimento molto più ampio Sympathy Lab L’associazione per l’industria tessile è un’iniziativa multi-stakeholder finanziata dalla Repubblica Federale Tedesca con l’obiettivo di ottenere miglioramenti sostenibili sociali

and sustainable practices in business With the help of two initiatives the BEPI Business Environmental Performance Initiative and the BSCI Business Social Compliance Initiative amfori members can monitor and assess their social and environmental performance including that of their partners eg suppliers Participants of this initiative commit to continual improvement collaboration and empowerment Sympatex has been a BSCI member since  and we use the code of conduct as a guide for our business practices In addition we guide and support many of our suppliers in their efforts to continually improve working conditions for all employees We are one of the “Best for the World” B Corps The B Corp Movement is a global movement led by companies that actively work towards an environmentally sustainable and socially fair future It is an internationally recognised label and represents an approach to business that is not based solely on maximising profits but also on a deep commitment to transparency

also make our photo shoots sustainable eat a vegan diet pay attention to short distances and offset any CO2 I have always said the very honest brands are very small companies The incentive of these collaborations is logical Because when very small companies work together they become bigger together It starts with the minimum order quantities MOQs which are hardly feasible for small brands That’s where it helps when different brands with the same mindset join forces In the supply chain the unit quantity issue is really the biggest problem The more sustainable you approach everything the more expensive it becomes Solving this sticking point is extremely difficult I can imagine government subsidies being helpful to offset these disadvantages With small companies margins are usually weak there’s not enough money to invest I really see the state as having an obligation Tax relief and subsidy programs would be an important step Consumers play the biggest role But if you take money out of

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What are the mutual objectives and outcomes expected from these collaborations?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result: The mutual objectives and outcomes expected from these collaborations involve achieving sustainability, responsibility, trust, recognition, and transparency within the textile industry. These goals aim to create a circular economy compatible with social and environmental standards while fostering open and visionary discussions among various partners and change leaders. By sharing information and working together, the participants hope to establish a library of resources that will enable the entire textile and outdoor sectors to transition towards a more circular model. Ultimately, the desired outcome is the creation of a broader movement driven by shared values and commitments to social, ecological, and economic sustainability.

source.content: practice Questa trasparenza incondizionata rappresenta un presupposto per la trasformazione del settore tessile in un’industria circolare socialmente e ecologicamente compatibile Ci affidiamo alla cooperazione all’interno dell’industria tessile e del settore dell’outdoor e da dicembre  con la serie di webinar “Sympathy Lab” stiamo promuovendo un dialogo aperto e visionario in collaborazione con vari partner noti e change leader per discutere regolarmente del settore In questo contesto iniziamo e impariamo insieme come la circolarità può funzionare per l’intera industria tessile e dell’outdoor L’obiettivo è quello di creare una libreria Per questo Sympathy Lab invita tutti gli attori a condividere qui le informazioni rilevanti solo insieme possiamo dare vita a un movimento molto più ampio Sympathy Lab L’associazione per l’industria tessile è un’iniziativa multi-stakeholder finanziata dalla Repubblica Federale Tedesca con l’obiettivo di ottenere miglioramenti sostenibili sociali

en face à face Production locale Nous fournissons nos produits en Europe et en Asie Selon le pays d’origine de la commande nous veillons à produire le plus localement possible afin d’éviter les voies de transport inutiles Chez Sympatex® nous travaillons depuis  selon une structure organisationnelle agile à hiérarchie plate au sein d’équipes de projet interdisciplinaires Notre mode de travail proactif et dynamique nous permet de saisir rapidement les opportunités afin d’élaborer des solutions de manière flexible et de les mettre en œuvre efficacement Nos relations mutuelles sont marquées par la confiance car nous sommes convaincus que chaque employée agit toujours avec les meilleures intentions et donne le meilleur de lui-même Nous adoptons donc une méthode de travail coopérative et autonome ainsi qu’une communication appréciative sur un pied d’égalité Nous fondons notre coopération et notre unité sur notre ensemble de valeurs nos « Big Five »  Durabilité responsabilité confiance

e di una comunicazione trasparente ci affidiamo alle visite regolari dei fornitori Qui sosteniamo la nostra relazione personale e sfruttiamo la preziosa opportunità per comunicare non solo tramite Internet ma faccia a faccia Produzione locale Ci riforniamo in Europa e in Asia A seconda del Paese dell’ordine dei nostri clienti ci assicuriamo di produrre localmente il più possibile per evitare tragitti di trasporto non necessari Noi di Sympatex dal  lavoriamo in una struttura organizzativa agile con gerarchie piatte in team di progetto interdisciplinari Il nostro modo di lavorare proattivo e intraprendente ci consente di cogliere in poco tempo le opportunità per sviluppare soluzioni in modo flessibile e implementarle con efficacia I nostri rapporti reciproci sono improntati alla fiducia siamo convinti che ogni dipendente agisca sempre con le migliori intenzioni e che dia il meglio di sé Pertanto manteniamo un modo di lavorare cooperativo e indipendente nonché una comunicazione alla pari

nos permite aprovechar las oportunidades casi de forma inmediata para desarrollar soluciones de forma flexible y aplicarlas de manera efectiva Cuidamos mucho el trato entre nosotros y lo basamos en la confianza ya que estamos convencidos de que cada empleada y empleado siempre actúan con la mejor de las intenciones y siempre dan lo mejor de sí Por ello cuidamos una forma de trabajar cooperativa e independiente y una comunicación de aprecio de igual a igual A la hora de colaborar y convivir seguimos nuestro canon de valores nuestro denominado «Big Five» Sostenibilidad responsabilidad confianza reconocimiento y transparencia Sympatex está comprometida con su responsabilidad social y con hacer que toda la cadena de valor textil sea social ecológica y económicamente sostenible Tenemos en cuenta los efectos directos e indirectos de nuestras actividades empresariales en la sociedad y el medio ambiente y actuamos de acuerdo con valores y principios generalmente reconocidos como la integridad
